text: this is the female kangaroo who was
carrying a baby or Joey when she was
struck it took four days for animal
welfare teams to capture her and she was
then brought to a veterinary hospital
well the operation to remove the arrow
went well and she and her Joey have now
been released back into the wild the
Australian Society for the Protection of
animals said it was horrified by a
deliberate and illegal act of cruelty
and says it's trying to track down the
culprit and bring them to justice but
let's hope there is a full recovery
